procedure_code.description: Primary procedure code (CPT, HCPCS, or ICD-10-PCS)

procedure_description.description: Detailed description of the procedure or service

procedure_category.description: Category or classification of the procedure

specialty.description: Medical specialty that typically performs this procedure

allowed_amount.description: Maximum allowed amount for this procedure

relative_value_unit.description: Relative Value Unit (RVU) for the procedure

possible_values: Numeric value, portion of total RVU
Numeric value, portion of total RVU
Numeric value, portion of total RVU

conversion_factor.description: Medicare conversion factor for fee calculation

facility_type.description: Type of facility where procedure is performed

frequency_limit.description: Maximum number of times procedure can be performed per period

possible_values: Numeric value, minutes or time units

effective_date.description: Date when procedure code became effective

termination_date.description: Date when procedure code was terminated

status.description: Current status of the procedure code

_meta.description: Comprehensive healthcare procedures and services data index following EDI 837/835 standards for procedure codes, billing information, clinical metadata, and coverage rules. This index supports procedure validation, cost analysis, coverage determination, and clinical decision support across healthcare operations.

use_cases.description: Real-time procedure code validation and detailed lookup services
scenarios: Validate procedure codes against current code sets
Look up procedure descriptions and billing information
Check procedure code status and effective dates
Verify modifier usage and bundling rules
Identify invalid or discontinued procedure codes
natural_language_prompts: Is procedure code 99213 valid and active?
Show me all details for CPT code 45380
Find procedures that require modifier 51
List all radiology procedures with RVU > 5.0
Get procedure description for HCPCS code G0438

use_cases.category: Cost Analysis and Fee Schedule Management
use_cases.description: Procedure cost analysis and fee schedule administration
scenarios: Analyze procedure costs and reimbursement rates
Compare allowed amounts across different payers
Track RVU utilization and fee schedule updates
Monitor billing accuracy and payment variances
Support contract negotiations and fee schedule development
natural_language_prompts: Show average allowed amount for MRI procedures
Compare RVU values for orthopedic procedures
Find procedures with highest reimbursement rates
List procedures with significant payment variances
Get fee schedule comparison for cardiology procedures

use_cases.description: Procedure coverage rules and prior authorization requirements
scenarios: Determine if procedures require prior authorization
Check age and gender restrictions for procedures
Validate frequency limits and bundling rules
Support coverage determination workflows
Manage prior authorization requests and approvals
natural_language_prompts: Which procedures require prior authorization?
Find procedures restricted to patients over 65
Show procedures with annual frequency limits
List procedures that can't be billed together
Get coverage rules for cosmetic procedures

use_cases.description: Clinical decision support and quality improvement initiatives
scenarios: Support clinical decision making with procedure information
Identify appropriate procedures for specific conditions
Track procedure utilization and outcomes
Support quality metrics and reporting
Enable evidence-based practice guidelines
natural_language_prompts: Find recommended procedures for diabetes management
Show procedures with highest complication rates
List procedures appropriate for pediatric patients
Get procedure utilization by specialty
Find procedures with quality measure requirements

use_cases.description: Provider education on procedure coding and billing
scenarios: Educate providers on proper procedure coding
Provide billing guidelines and requirements
Support coding audits and compliance reviews
Offer training on new procedure codes and updates
Facilitate provider documentation improvements
natural_language_prompts: Show coding guidelines for evaluation and management
Find procedures commonly miscoded in cardiology
List new procedure codes introduced in 2023
Get documentation requirements for surgery codes
Show procedures requiring specific provider credentials

reports_generated.description: Comprehensive procedure code analysis, cost management, and utilization tracking reports

report_categories.description: Procedure code validation, status, and utilization analysis
sample_prompts: Show active vs inactive procedure codes by specialty
Generate new procedure codes report for 2023
